snippet: A video for her song, written in response to the death of Eric Garner during an encounter with the police on Staten Island, combines photos of civil rights demonstrations from the past and present.
abstract: Pop star Alicia Keys releases new song We Gotta Pray in protest of Staten Island grand jury's decision not to indict white police officer in the death of Eric Garner; song, which pleads for peaceful protest, is accompanied by video that combines photos of civil rights demonstrations from the past and present.
lead_paragraph: A video for her song, written in response to the death of Eric Garner during an encounter with the police on Staten Island, combines photos of civil rights demonstrations from the past and present.

headline.main: Alicia Keys, With Garner Anthem ‘We Gotta Pray,’ Pleads for Peaceful Protests
headline.print_headline: In Anthem, Singer Pleads for Strength
